name: pimatic-ultrasonic
description: Support for the HC-SR04 ultrasonic sensor.
readme: pimatic-ultrasonic ================ Support for the HC-SR04 ultrasonic sensor. ### Example config Add the plugin to the plugin section: ```json { "plugin": "ultrasonic" } ``` Then add a sensor for your device to the devices section: ```json { "id": "ultrasonic", "name": "Ultrasonic HC-SR04", "class": "Ultrasonic", "echo": 22, "trigger": 18, "timeout": 750, "delay": 60, "sample": 5, "interval": 60000 } ``` You can also select the unit: example: "displayUnit": "cm" Thank you Clemens Akens for r-pi-usonic and sweet pi for inspiration and his work on best automatization software Pimatic.
